description:
Thank you fro visiting iBooks Author for beginner.

In this lesson, you can create your first iBook using iBooks Author. You will learn how to create an iBook, and also learn how to publish it to iBooks store.

<OUTLINE OF LESSON >

  • create an Apple ID
  • add payment information
  • download applications
  • create a book title
  • modify book title
  • create a chapter and icon
  • create a section
  • place a movie
  • Table of contents and intro media
  • Preview
  • Publish a book
  • Create a sample book

You can create an awesome e-book using iBooks Author. It is quite easy to put an image or a movie on your e-book. If you have a Mac, you can publish your ebook. In fact, the procedure of publishing is complicated a little. Let publish your first e-book to all over the world.Your future customers are waiting for your ebook now. Let create now soon!
title: iBooks Author for beginner
